titlestmt.titleproper: Natzler (Otto and Gertrud) letters to Hella Hammid
A Finding Aid to Otto and Gertrud Natzler Letters to Hella Hammid, 1963-1973, in the Archives of American Art
titlestmt.author: Ryan Evans

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-05-13 09:00:17 -0400.

did.unittitle: Otto and Gertrud Natzler letters to Hella Hammid
did.abstract: Twenty-nine letters from Otto and Gertrud Natzler to Hella Hammid and three postcards from Otto and Gail Reynolds Natzler to Hammid, 1963-1973 and undated.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Hella Hammid (1921-1992) was a German American photographer in Los Angles, California. Hammid was friends with ceramicists Otto and Gertrud Natzler. After Gertrud's death in 1971, Otto married Gail Reynolds.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Twenty-nine letters from ceramicists Otto and Gertrud Natzler to Hella Hammid and three postcards from Otto and Gail Reynolds Natzler to Hammid, 1963-1973 and undated.

userestrict.head: Terms of Use
userestrict.p: The Archives of American Art makes its archival collections available for non-commercial, educational and personal use unless restricted by copyright and/or donor restrictions, including but not limited to access and publication restrictions. AAA makes no representations concerning such rights and restrictions and it is the user's responsibility to determine whether rights or restrictions exist and to obtain any necessary permission to access, use, reproduce and publish the collections. Please refer to the Smithsonian's Terms of Use for additional information.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research. Access to original papers requires an appointment and is limited to the Archives' Washington, D.C. Research Center.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Donated in 2022 by Julia Hammid, Hella Hammid's daughter.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Theh Archives of American Art also holds the papers of Otto and Gertrud Natzler.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Otto and Gertrud Natzler Letters to Hella Hammid, circa 1963-1973. Archives of American Art, Smithsonian Institution.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Due to its small size the collection is arranged in one series.

scopecontent.p: Twenty-nine letters from Otto and Gertrud Natzler to Hella Hammid and three postcards from Otto and Gail Reynolds Natzler to Hammid, 1963-1973 and undated.
